newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Intuit restarted. [CORRECTED 19:50 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Intuit restarted. [CORRECTED 19:50 GMT]

text.p: -- Lehman Brothers analyst Michael E. Stanek said he restarted coverage of Inuit Inc with a neutral rating.
(Corrects to show coverage was restarted, not initiated.)

-- "By selling Intuit Services Corp, we believe that investors will breathe a sigh of relief as Intuit has decided to exit the transaction processing business and will begin to focus efforts on its front-ended software products," Stanek said in a research note. "We believe that Intuit received and excellent price for ISC."
-- CheckFree Corp said it had agreed to acquire ISC, Intuit's electronic bill payment and bank services unit, for 12.6 million shares of common stock in CheckFreeCorp.
